The data is obtained from [IPUMS](https://cps.ipums.org/cps/index.shtml).

Set the current directory to contain the IPUMS data.
```{r}
# setwd('/asec/data')
```

Display the column descriptions:
```{r}
library('ipumsr')
ddi <- read_ipums_ddi("cps_00001.xml")
data <- read_ipums_micro(ddi)
str(data)
```
Write the data to a CSV so I can escape R hell and use the data in Python.
```{r}
write.csv(data, "data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
